item.description:
"Cider donuts? Caramel Apples? Foliage? Wine? Brews? Breakfast? Live music? A Designated Driver to and from the Bluegrass and Brews Festival at Nashoba Valley in Bolton? Yep. Join us!"

I attended this event last year and had a blast! The cost is $25 and it includes a bus ride to and from the festival, continental breakfast, wine tour, and awesome live bluegrass music. On Your Feet Project is giving money raised from this event to the Friday Night Supper Program.

TO REGISTER GO TO....http://www.oyfp.org/B...

You can also meet us at the festival if you would like to come on your own. Just indicate in your RSVP your transportation mode, so that I can know who I am meeting at what spot.

See ya there!
Shantelle
item.how_to_find_us: I'll give you my cell phone number when you rsvp.
item.name: Bluegrass and Brews Festival
